reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293: FEES FOR TRANSCRIPTS AND STATEMENTS OF  STANDING AND FOR DUPLICATES OF DIPLOMAS, CERTIFICATES AND LETTERS OF STANDING
reg_info.reg_name_text: FEES FOR TRANSCRIPTS AND STATEMENTS OF STANDING AND FOR DUPLICATES OF DIPLOMAS, CERTIFICATES AND LETTERS OF STANDING
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293: FEES FOR TRANSCRIPTS AND STATEMENTS OF  STANDING AND FOR DUPLICATES OF DIPLOMAS, CERTIFICATES AND LETTERS OF STANDING

content.content: 1. (1) The fee for a transcript of standing, or for a duplicate of a diploma or certificate, obtained in Ontario by a pupil is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 1; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 1. (2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows: 1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21. 2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22. 3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23. 4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The fee for a transcript of standing, or for a duplicate of a diploma or certificate, obtained in Ontario by a pupil is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 1; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 1.

(2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows:

1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21.

2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22.

3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23.

4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) The fee for a duplicate of an Ontario Teacher’s Certificate is $37.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 2; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 2. (2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows: 1. As of October 1, 1993, to $39. 2. As of July 1, 1994, to $41. 3. As of July 1, 1995, to $43. 4. As of July 1, 1996, to $45.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The fee for a duplicate of an Ontario Teacher’s Certificate is $37.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 2; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 2.

(2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows:

1. As of October 1, 1993, to $39.

2. As of July 1, 1994, to $41.

3. As of July 1, 1995, to $43.

4. As of July 1, 1996, to $45.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) The fee for a duplicate of a letter of standing, or of a certificate of qualification as a teacher other than an Ontario Teacher’s Certificate, is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 3; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 3. (2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows: 1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21. 2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22. 3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23. 4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The fee for a duplicate of a letter of standing, or of a certificate of qualification as a teacher other than an Ontario Teacher’s Certificate, is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 3; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 3.

(2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows:

1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21.

2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22.

3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23.

4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 3.

content.content: 4. (1) The fee for the preparation by the Ministry, on the request of a teacher, of a statement of standing obtained, and a description of courses completed, at a teacher’s education institution in Ontario is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 4; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 4. (2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows: 1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21. 2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22. 3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23. 4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 4.  Français
content.raw_html:
4. (1) The fee for the preparation by the Ministry, on the request of a teacher, of a statement of standing obtained, and a description of courses completed, at a teacher’s education institution in Ontario is $20.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 293, s. 4; O. Reg. 341/92, s. 4.

(2) The fee set out in subsection (1) shall be adjusted as follows:

1. As of October 1, 1993, to $21.

2. As of July 1, 1994, to $22.

3. As of July 1, 1995, to $23.

4. As of July 1, 1996, to $24.  O. Reg. 522/93, s. 4.
